website_summaries.verdict: Silica supplement in liquid form that's easy to swallow.
pros: Easier to swallow than large capsules
Arguably better absorption because of its liquid form
cons: Each bottle is only a 30-day supply
As such, this is an expensive supplement

customer_reviews.title: Too soon to tell
customer_reviews.text: So my hairdresser recommended that I start using silica for my thinning hair. (I'm a 59 year old female.) As many of you know vitamins and supplements take a while to work (usually about 6 months) I've only been using this for three weeks. So it's far too soon to tell. But I can report that it is completely tasteless. I just add two droppers to a glass of water in the morning and drink it down. My hairdresser says she just squirts it under her tongue! I try to remember to post another review in February. BTW, if you have a Sprout's Farmer's Market nearby, they carry this item in a 18oz size.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Helps to build Muscles, Strong Bones and Keeps Hair shiny!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bottle of Silica I have ordered. I workout and was told by my massage therapist that it helps build muscles. I saw her yesterday and she said "OH MY GOSH! Look at your muscles!" Well I knew they were nice and firm but it's great to have confirmation other than my sweet husband. I also take it because I know the human body is extremely deficient in minerals. Silca is also great for bones, teeth, nails and skin!
customer_reviews.author: Christine A

customer_reviews.title: Aid for Dimentia
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a friend and his wife says she notices that he is more alert. He is 83 yrs old.
customer_reviews.author: Darryll E. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Consistent consumption may result in stronger, healthy nails
customer_reviews.text: Clear solution that's tasteless and odorless. Two full droppers of this product will give the thirty drops recommended for daily consumption. By week two I noticed a major improvement in the quality and health of my fingernails and toe nails. They were stronger and looked healthy, especially my middle toe nails on both feet. I also took this product with vegan magnesium, which works with silica. This product was non-irritating after consumption. The product dries as a white, flaky residue. I think I'll repurchase because of the health of my nails. I bought this product for collagen production, and I figure it's working based on the noticeable difference in my nails.
customer_reviews.author: lady truth

customer_reviews.title: Made my hair fall worse!
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the positive reviews, I was hoping this would work for me. Unfortunately, it did not AND did the complete opposite. I would sit there drinking this stuff and watch my hair fall out! I would NOT recommend this product to anyone if you want to keep your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been adding this to my water daily. It’s great. It turns my faucet into a Fiji water dispenser. Haha!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: This works for connective tissue
customer_reviews.text: Helped to completely resolve some connective tissue injuries. Very happy with this product. Thanks to Eidon...
customer_reviews.author: Mark G

customer_reviews.title: Dirty dropper
customer_reviews.text: Cannot measure this item as the dropper is stopped up with some type of crystals. I would be happy with a replacement of the dropper. I have not used the product.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick B.

customer_reviews.title: No taste; big results
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't happy about using drops in my water but there is absolutely no taste or residue when I added it. This has really helped my hair grow, even my hairdresser asked what I was using for my hair! She started using it for her fingernails and commented her nails were so strong, like 'little bricks".
customer_reviews.author: B. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware - Tampered Looking  Label
customer_reviews.text: I like the brand of drops. The quality is good. The bottle however looks tampered. The label is dirty with the lot number and expiration date are scratched off.
customer_reviews.author: SFG

customer_reviews.title: helpful
customer_reviews.text: help with connective tissue problems, I take it every day

customer_reviews.title: EASY LIQUID WELLNESS
customer_reviews.text: So Far I believe this product will be very beneficial to my body that has been depleted of Silica for way too long. Its easy to take, liquid is the best for absorbing anything to restore the bodies cells....etc. Will continue to take this product.
customer_reviews.author: MGZTRUTHFUL

customer_reviews.title: Helps with hair loss
customer_reviews.text: I have Lupus and hair loss is common with it. I started taking this and my hair stopped thinning and actually started growing like weeds lol It also made my skin very smooth. I take this everyday!

customer_reviews.title: For Hair, Skin, and Nails
customer_reviews.text: I use it for the above results. This is my second bottle and I see the results daily.
customer_reviews.author: Dawnkaree

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Didn't do anything for me don't waste your money. I took the whole bottle exactly as it says and didn't see any difference actually my hair looks and feels dryer I am fully disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t noticed any super good changes but I also haven’t noticed any bad changes. I care too much about my health to not try at all so I can’t complain.

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected Cheaper than buying water with this added.

customer_reviews.title: Love it

customer_reviews.title: Helps my blood pressure and joint and tissue health.

customer_reviews.title: Take for hair loss
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing I have found that does seem to help My hair loss due to nursing. Wouldn't say it's 100% effective, however, it does seem to be helping. I go through bottle every month and I wish it came in larger bottle. Defiantly can tell a difference in my nails that are hard and the longest ive ever seen them.
customer_reviews.author: Cdgr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I will not be without this. Really helps with joint pain.

customer_reviews.title: worked just like the ad said
customer_reviews.text: seem's to work ok but haven't noticed a lot of of differance
customer_reviews.author: dnl

customer_reviews.title: I'm hooked and cannot do without!
customer_reviews.text: I started using Silica when I went through chemo. My hair has grown so fast and it is as thick as it was when I was in my teens. I stopped using the product for a week and I immediately started noticing breakage in my hair. This is a MUST product for me. My nails also grow very fast and are super strong. I would highly recommend using this product. If you are going through cancer or have a serious immune deficiency please consult your oncologist prior to taking this mineral supplement.
customer_reviews.author: tatiana chircop-rollick

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!! Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great!!!! Hair and nail grow too fast that’s the only one bad side effect lol
customer_reviews.author: Aye

customer_reviews.title: ... definitely buy this again it make you water taste great.
customer_reviews.text: I will most definitely buy this again it make you water taste great.

customer_reviews.title: Great for hair and nails
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to take, has no taste, and has helped my hair and nails grow strong. I will buy more of it.
customer_reviews.author: WINKIE

customer_reviews.title: great for hair and nails
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking silica pills for many years and to find this in a liquid form easy to take, just put it in my water tremendous results with my hair my nails my calmness great product
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Barr

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep me young.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it keeps me young. True, there are no miracle supplements but this one is close. I am noticing smoother complexion and fewer lines and wrinkles. This is one great product...
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: I think it's working. I am taking this along ...
customer_reviews.text: I think it's working. I am taking this along with ionic minerals. My hair has gotten thicker since taking this. Not sure if it's a coincidence or not. Don't see any difference in my nails. I did have goose skin bumps on the back of the arms and other places that I battled for years which have gone away. Not sure which one helped however.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: No taste
customer_reviews.text: No taste at all so it's easy to mix in water and you don't know it's there. Didn't seem to make any difference in my skin or how I felt
customer_reviews.author: J. Mack

customer_reviews.title: It is still too early to tell if this product ...
customer_reviews.text: It is still too early to tell if this product is helping me. I rated it a five because I have nothing negative to say.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Sutorius

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good..
customer_reviews.text: It would be better to get a larger size or 2 bottles. I put 15 drops in my water 16oz bottles. Good way to get your silica.
customer_reviews.author: christina suspanic

customer_reviews.title: Silica and Raw Meal
customer_reviews.text: I like most of the products. I have not seen any improvement from taking Silica for my bones, and I have been taking it faithfully for 3 years. The raw meal seems healthy, but the thickness of it is not the easiest to swallow down, although I may order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: The silica by Eidon is a wonderful product. It loosens my joints! My neck adjusts itself automatically! Obviously my body really needs the silica and this silica product is obviously well absorbed by my 76-year old body!
customer_reviews.author: Mona C.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is recommended by my doctor so it must be a really good product. He does research and has products tested at a lab before recommending anything.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: This mineral got rid of little "knubbies" around my finger joints! I was surprised but glad. I take this every day for skin and bone health.
customer_reviews.author: Good Old Bear

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take, great results.
customer_reviews.text: I got this product to help with my hair, skin, and nails, as well as shrink a Bartholin cyst. It’s worked great for everything. My hair seems shinier and thicker, nails are stronger, skin heals faster, and my Bartholin cyst shrank right up. I’m on my second bottle. Two droppers in a glass of water a day, and you can’t taste it at all. If anything, it makes your tap water taste a little nicer, like Fiji or Evian.
customer_reviews.author: Sage Pennington

customer_reviews.title: good for hair and nails
customer_reviews.text: very good for hair and nails, easy to use, I just put a dropperful in my morning glass of water
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Fox

customer_reviews.title: Not sure I need it.
customer_reviews.text: Gave 4 stars only because I'm not sure I need it for my hair. It worked at first and then didn't seem to do a thing. Not sure what's going on. Maybe an over-load in my system?
customer_reviews.author: Lil

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I think this Eidon silica supplement is a good product. It's easy to use and goes a long way. Time will tell if it makes a difference.

customer_reviews.title: Great brand available I non concentrate also
customer_reviews.text: For my dog, highly concentrated for addition to food once a day. I also use this bran for addition to water. Smooth taste, add to filtered water and is great for the brain, tendons and ligaments.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Improves skin creapiness. Makes skin tighter and thicker. I 've ordered it several times.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Silica!
customer_reviews.text: Edison Silica is tasteless & mixes with anything & a great % of Silica!

customer_reviews.title: Works well noticed a difference the second day.
customer_reviews.text: Works well noticed a difference the second day. Take it slow and build up to the daily dose.

customer_reviews.title: ... and potent in a concentrated form which makes it easy to take compared to a lot of the other ...
customer_reviews.text: pure and potent in a concentrated form which makes it easy to take compared to a lot of the other liquid silica and capsules which contain a lot of fillers. I really like the EIDON brand.
customer_reviews.author: rs

customer_reviews.title: told it was good for joints
customer_reviews.text: I could feel the difference in a few days in my elbows not popping as much at night and with starting a stationary bike routine I figured it would help prevent knee problems

customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if it is doing anything or not. I take it for my hair.

customer_reviews.text: Bought this to add the the water my kids consume. I add it to a gallon of water a few droppers no taster change and they dont even notice.

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother!
customer_reviews.text: It came broke and I am having trouble getting a replacement. Dont bother!

customer_reviews.title: Greatly needed
customer_reviews.text: You body will benefit from the daily use of this product. Mixed with water it has not after taste. I will reorder this in a few days when my supply is finish.

customer_reviews.title: Makes a big difference
customer_reviews.text: It really helps me address hair loss. Arrived faster than expected.

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTE NEED
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE BEEN USING SILICA FOR OVER A YEAR NOW AND CANNOT BE WITHOUT IT MY NAILS HAVE IMPROVED SO MUCH SINCE I STARTING USING THIS. I FIRST BOUGHT AT A HEALTH MARKET. THE PRICE I FOUND ON AMAZON IS GREAT. I AM BUYING TWO FOR THE PRICE I WAS PAYING AT A LOCAL HEALTH MARKET.

customer_reviews.title: I have it only once in a while as too much silica is not good for anyone
customer_reviews.text: Tasteless, I have it only once in a while as too much silica is not good for anyone.

customer_reviews.text: Got this to help my husband's joints. Didn't feel any improvement.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really have not seen the difference I expected in my nails they are still soft and bend and rip
customer_reviews.author: Linda G. Dubois

customer_reviews.title: For bone density
customer_reviews.text: This seemt to be what I need as one of the supliments for helping bone density. I hope they work.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M

customer_reviews.title: The best Silica Supplement
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good Silica supplement with no taste whatsoever and with noticeable effects on nails and hair after only a few weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: luciana Chapman

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a tool to prepare my body for motherhood...I am not pregnant now, but through much research in general, I found that having adequate minerals such as magnesium and silica are super important for mom and baby. The silica tastes like nothing to me, as I mix it in a glass of water with apple cider vinegar and a touch of stevia in the morning when I wake up. I have yet to take it long enough to really notice any changes/results, however, based on what I have experienced as far as taste, etc, I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: D. Karragiannidis

customer_reviews.title: didn't notice anything
customer_reviews.text: no taste (which was great) but didn't notice a big difference in hair or nails. nice pure product though. maybe need to use for longer.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lapan

customer_reviews.text: ? Don’t really know how to quantify a rating for this.
customer_reviews.author: hollymae

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I tried it for a week. Didn't do anything other than leaving a weird taste in my mouth.
customer_reviews.author: FurbyMama

customer_reviews.title: Takes FOREVER to get to you...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how the silica works so far, but it took almost 3 weeks to get to me... just FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Sally88

customer_reviews.title: This product should be removed from distribution and reformulated...
customer_reviews.text: I'm convinced that this product, along with Eidon's Multiple Mineral, contains silica as nothing other than dilute water glass. I know it has been a long time on the market making my complaint seem void, but whatever. The burning to my lips was consistently unmistakable along with stomach cramping. I've returned all six orders - intended as gifts or for myself - for a refund. I bought so many because I have a habit of blaming my own inadequacies rather than the product thinking that my symptoms using this product would eventually go away. They got worse.
customer_reviews.author: Vinyasi

product_meta.title: Eidon Silica Mineral Supplement, 2 Ounce
feature_bullets: Helps form the collagen matrix and manage calcium
